channel.title: I can't find this pesky PK spot [PI]
channel.description: I'm trying to remove the PK spot in yanille but I can't find the darn place where it stops. I searched the x co-ord and then the y co-ord but nothing! Any suggestions :s?

item.title: I can't find this pesky PK spot [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

Just keep walking around yanille, you’ll end up finding it one way. It’s probrably inside the wall that surrounds the city.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't find this pesky PK spot [PI]
